## Koatty.callback() method

return a request handler callback for http/gRPC/ws server.

**Signature:**

```typescript
callback(protocol?: string, reqHandler?: (ctx: KoattyContext) => Promise<any>): (req: unknown, res: unknown) => Promise<any>;
```
